text:
manuShyaCandaqsaM cata#sraScAqShTau ca# dEvaCandaqsaM caiqva ma#nuShya CandaqsaScAva# rundhaq 
A traya#stri(gm) SatO juhOtiq traya#stri(gm)Saqdvai dEqvatA# dEqvatA# EqvAva# rundhaq A&ShTAca#tvAri(gm)SatO juhOtyaqShTAca#tvAri(gm)-SadakSharAq jaga#tIq jAga#tAH paqSavOq jaga#tyaiqvAsmai# paqSUnava# rundhEq vAja#Sca prasaqvaScEti# dvAdaqSaM ju#hOtiq dvAda#Saq mAsA$H saM~MvathsaqraH sa#M~Mvathsaqra Eqva prati# tiShThati || 42
(vi - vai - yaqj~jaH-sAma# ca maq ityA#ha - ca tiqsra - ScaikAqnna pa#~jcAqSacca#) (A8)
